snippet: A commission is investigating Li Chuncheng, a Sichuan Province official, who was named an alternate member of the Communist Party’s Central Committee last month.
abstract: China's anticorruption commission opens investigation of Li Chuncheng, deputy party secretary of Sichuan Province, making him first senior official to be identified as target of commission since country's new leadership took power.
lead_paragraph: A commission is investigating Li Chuncheng, a Sichuan Province official, who was named an alternate member of the Communist Party’s Central Committee last month.

headline.seo: Early Target of China’s Anticorruption Commission Identified
headline.main: China’s Anticorruption Commission Investigates Senior Official
headline.print_headline: Antigraft Inquiry Targets Senior Chinese Official

keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
keywords.name: organizations
